name: ReStreamed
description:
ReStreamed is a horror game where you take on the role of a streamer streaming a horror game (very meta!)  Keep your hundreds of totally "real" viewers entertained as you try to escape your mysterious captors. Instructions

Use WASD to move (duh). 

E to interact

Enter to engage with the chat (be nice!)

Playtime: 30 minutes. 

Playthroughs and Feedback

Feel free to share any videos or thoughts! I'd love to watch your playthroughs and/or get some feedback and ideas!, if you share them on twitter or Instagram feel free to @ me (@_Furimo_) or use the hashtag #ReStreamedGame.

Credits

A game by Fredrik Ulvmoen
